promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special gorilla steel-type pokemon holding a dark shield. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ironprimate, a a gigantic special gorilla steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Iron Lance. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "steel" or "Ironprimate". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, gorilla-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Inhabiting towering peaks, this titanic, metallic simian wields its Iron Lance ability to mine ores. Its majestic presence ensures dominance.
